title: Plan Ahead for Dreamforce 2017
meta_description:

In November.
What’s that? Oh, yes, we know it’s currently early August. But we have your back.
short_description:
Dreamforce is coming!

In November.

What’s that? Oh, yes, we know it’s currently early August. But we have your back.
long_description:
Dreamforce is coming!

In November.

What’s that? Oh, yes, we know it’s currently early August. But we have your back. 

And as the ones who have your back, we need 2 tell you: plan ahead! Dreamforce is notorious 4 eating up accommodations early throughout San Francisco.  

We don’t want you to be left out in the cold. Or, um, not really super cold. Kinda cold. It is SF after all, but you should really find a hotel, you know?

We know a good one ;)

Ok, maybe we need to back up a little. What is this notorious event that packs SF hotels and forces us to write blog posts about it months in advance?

Great question.

 

Dreamforce 2017

It’s a learning event. Or, as they tell it:

“Four days of transforming your career, giving back, having a ball, and connecting with your community of fellow Trailblazers — all at the largest software conference in the world.”

Tons of high-profile speakers. More than 2,700 breakout sessions. 

And it’s for pretty much anyone: sales, IT, marketing, developers, automotive, communications, government, healthcare, manufacturing, retail, startups. 

You get the idea. 

You should go if you feel stuck in a rut and want to be inspired. You should go if you want to gain new insights and transform your career. 

Explore cutting-edge innovations. 

Meet new people. 

Hear new things. 

Have a blast. 

All of the above. You don’t need to chose just one. 

As stated above (because we have your back) Dreamforce is happening in November; from the 6th through the 9th to be exact. It takes place in multiple locations throughout the city. 

So, basically just get here and you're there.

 

Book in Advance, Save Up to 15%

You’re planning ahead. Great! 

We want to help. Use this offer to save up to 15% off your hotel stay at Stanford Court for Dreamforce 2017.
